title: Can we get a report button outside of lobby?
body: sometimes I just quit the lobby/client and I forget to report people , could we get a feature to report them outside of game lobbies? I prefer not having to write to support for them to investigate someone. Nothing really much to it , just a feature I'd like to see

replies.body: your best bet in that situation is to just use the report a player option in the support tab of the site
i think a better bet would be playing Lotto.

It'd be nice to put the report options in the match history. Its rare but it happens! Often times when you just want to leave the post-lobby to avoid all that flaming as well. Don't want to sit there and hit report while getting cussed at. Speaking of which, a mute button in post lobby would be great as well but I dunno if that will happen.

Eeeeh.

If you forget about reporting them, maybe they did not deserve the report-ban.

While it sounds like a good feature, I wouldn't be surprised if we never see something like this. If people are willing to just straight run it down for no reason whatsoever, you'll surely find someone to write an algorithm to just cycle through names and flood incoming reports with random accusations.

Perhaps per match history could work, but even then.. how often do you check your match history because of a feeder after a game. If you want to report someone.. just do it right after the game.
